This website provides a collection of resources for the book [_Computing Geographically: Bridging Giscience and Geography_](https://www.guilford.com/books/Computing-Geographically/David-O'Sullivan/9781462553938) (Guilford Press, New York).

Included are:

+ Current links for internet sources referenced in the text
+ Code samples to create the base graphics for some of the figures
+ Background information on other figures

Access them either from the drop-down menu by chapter, or from this [listing page](index-listing.qmd).
